subject: Add app diagnostics tab to debug banner for testing race condition fixes
body:
- Created utils/debugLog.ts: lightweight in-memory event log with subscriber pattern
- Added diagnostic logging to useMessages: subscribe-before-fetch, merge logic,
  poll staleness detection, realtime dedup, messagesRef usage
- Added diagnostic logging to useChats: fetch counter staleness, debounce coalescing
- Added diagnostic logging to useReactions: pending ops tracking, poll skip reasons
- Added diagnostic logging to onesignal.ts: SDK deferred callback, subscription
  state-checking loop with iteration count and timing
- Updated PWADebugBanner with two tabs (App/PWA), color-coded sources, clear/copy

https://claude.ai/code/session_015eDAMCyYtCCyqrg7YDhveR
title: Add app diagnostics tab to debug banner for testing race condition fixes
